name: Remnux
usage: Remnux is a Linux toolkit for reverse-engineering and analyzing malicious software. It provides a curated collection of free tools created by the community.

windows.usage: Type `wsl` in a terminal, then you have a Remnux environment in the command prompt

troubleshooting.title: Error : `$'\r': command not found`
troubleshooting.description: The script is used for both operating system windows and ubuntu. So it could be some error of comptability when you change the file in Ubuntu. In fact, when you save a file from Ubuntu, it create a newline character at the end and that's not compatible in Windows. To solve this problem, you should write in command line `wsl sed -i 's/$//' path/to/script/filename.sh`

ubuntu.usage: It's directly in the prompt command
